intent_atoms.description: Provide lenient-versus-strict performance benchmarking for ISOInspector CLI to validate runtime and RSS differences.
Benchmark must capture average runtime and RSS deltas for both lenient and strict modes using LargeFileBenchmarkTests.
Performance budgets in tolerant-mode must allow up to 1.2× runtime overhead and +50 MiB RSS increase, enforced by XCTest assertions.
Runtime overhead must not exceed 1.049× and RSS increase must not exceed 0.01 MiB for the 32 MiB fixture measurements.
Add tolerant-mode performance budgets to PerformanceBenchmarkConfiguration and wire them into XCTest assertions.

functional_units.name: Lenient vs Strict Performance Benchmarking
functional_units.description: Captures average runtime and RSS deltas for CLI validation runs using lenient-versus-strict mode in LargeFileBenchmarkTests.

functional_units.name: Tolerant-Mode Performance Budgets Configuration
functional_units.description: Defines performance budget limits (1.2× runtime, +50 MiB RSS) in PerformanceBenchmarkConfiguration and applies XCTest assertions.

functional_units.name: Local Measurement Recording for 32 MiB Fixture
functional_units.description: Records local measurements showing runtime overhead ≤1.049× and RSS increase ≤0.01 MiB, archived in a log file.
